page.title: 07Kettlethorpe/Fenton Events
page.content: The main event of recent times, involving all residents of three villages was the celebration of Queen Elizabeth's Silver Jubilee 1977.Roads were closed as a parade of floats, depicting major developments during the past 25 years, processed through the villages. Sports and games were organised for children & adults. The parish Chairmen presented each child with a Jubilee mug. Afternoon tea for 400 was provided in the newly refurbished Village Hall. Senior citizens played Whist & had supper in the Hall. A pantomime, written & performed by local talent, played for two nights to packed houses in January 1981. Annual events: Laughterton v Fenton/ Kettlethorpe Gents'Cricket & Ladies' Rounders matches, Harvest Suppers,Xmas Fayres & Dances, Sponsored walks.
